description: Explore the comprehensive overview of Infineon Technologies' software licensing strategies, important for partners and clients using their semiconductor solutions. Learn about the types of licenses offered, key terms, challenges, the role of blockchain, and future directions in licensing.
keywords: Infineon, software licensing, semiconductor solutions, proprietary licenses, open source licenses, dual licensing, blockchain, smart contracts, AI, machine learning
title: Understanding Infineon's Software Licensing: A Comprehensive Overview
